version_description: Map improvements.
Map improvements.
Various improvements.
Various improvements.

In this new update we have worked hard to make the app faster and more reliable. We have improved the speed of various components, improved GPS management, allowing you to save your battery and introduced new features that will be revealed in the near future!

We have created new features that have been suggested by you in recent months, so thanks for all your ideas and feedback.

If you like this app, don’t forget to rate us and write reviews or suggestions for future improvements.

Stay tuned, exciting new updates coming soon!

In this new update we have worked hard to make the app faster and more reliable. We have improved the speed of various components, improved GPS management, allowing you to save your battery and introduced new features that will be revealed in the near future!

We have created new features that have been suggested by you in recent months, so thanks for all your ideas and feedback.

If you like this app, don’t forget to rate us and write reviews or suggestions for future improvements.

Stay tuned, exciting new updates coming soon!

Hola!
After an intense implementation and testing phase, we have been able to make the app faster and more stable.
With improvements to internal components, including the camera the app will be easier to use.
New features will be revealed in the near future and some will be left for you to discover!
And from now on, you can use 3D touch on your iPhone 6S.
Enjoy! As always, please send us your feedback and suggestions for improvements ;-)

Hola!
After an intense implementation and testing phase, we have been able to make the app faster and more stable.
With improvements to internal components, including the camera the app will be easier to use.
New features will be revealed in the near future and some will be left for you to discover!
And from now on, you can use 3D touch on your iPhone 6S.
Enjoy! As always, please send us your feedback and suggestions for improvements ;-)

Hi all! Have you missed us? :)

Here's what happened in the meantime:

[x] multiple filters:
Now you can filter multiple campaigns. Try it and see how it works!! You will love it!!!
[x] camera optimization
[x] solved some login problems
[x] tons of new colors
[ ] new bugs that will be fixed in the next release ;-)

How about 3d touch? Have you tried it?

If you like the app please consider to give us 5 stars; in case of problems please contact us at support.uk@bemyeye.com

Thank's

BME Mobile Team

Home-based Missions

Thanks for using BeMyEye! Our app improves as we take your numerous comments into account:
- Enjoy a new, more fluid, and more intuitive camera when completing your missions
- Notifications settings have been adjusted to better keep you informed of the missions available around you
- Some minor changes have been made to the application interface for a more enjoyable navigation

A few little updates to improve your experience on the app:
1. New welcome screens to make our new users' first experience easier
2. A new sponsorship system, including better paid "super sponsorships" that you will enjoy pretty soon in some areas

Don't forget to keep on sending us your feedbacks!

Thank you for your continued support to the BeMyEye app! This new update includes small fixes and improvements so you can have the best experience possible while using the app. The app is now available in Danish, Finnish, Portuguese, Swedish and Czech.

Thank you for your continued support to the BeMyEye app! This new version has been rebuilt to offer significant performance improvements and a lot of bug fixes, so you can have the best experience possible while using the app. The app also now includes the ability to make audio records, that may be required for some missions.

Thank you for using BeMyEye! We keep working hard so you may enjoy a great experience with our app: we are always fixing bugs and improving the app’s performance. We also added a new training feature, available for specific missions only, to help you complete those easily.

Thank you for using BeMyEye!
With this new version of the app we introduced a new, easier, way for taking pictures during in-store missions. This will help you be faster around the shelves and submit more accurate shelf pictures.
As usual we are also always fixing bugs and improving the app’s performance.
